summary: Prepares images and COCO annotations for Deformable DETR models by applying configurable resizing, rescaling, normalization, and padding, and converting bounding boxes to a normalized center‑x, center‑y, width, height format; also supports post‑processing of detection and panoptic outputs.
business_intent: Facilitate reliable and consistent input preprocessing and output handling for Deformable DETR in object detection and panoptic segmentation workflows, reducing integration effort and ensuring model‑compatible data.
